question: IIT Kharagpur and this government signed an MoU to collaborate on the development of a Happiness Index for measuring the well-being of the people of the state.
explanation: IIT Kharagpur's Rekhi Centre of Excellence for the Science of Happiness has signed an MoU with Madhya Pradesh government to collaborate on the development of a Happiness Index for measuring the well-being of the people of the state. It will also develop an online screening and assessment system in order to screen.
